product_name: Sawyer Premium Sunblock with Insect Repellent - 3 oz
long_description: Get all-day sun protection and bug repellency in 1 easy application using Sawyer Premium Sunblock with Insect Repellent spray. Provides SPF 30 protection from harmful solar rays. Repels insects up to 8 hrs. Active ingredient is IR3535(R) insect repellent; does not contain DEET. Hypoallergenic formula won't clog your pores. Provides all-day waterproof and sweatproof protection. Application is simple with spray pump bottle; bottle meets airline carry-on size requirements.
short_description: Get all-day sun protection and bug repellency in 1 easy application using Sawyer Premium Sunblock with Insect Repellent spray.
